reviewText: By far, the best instructional windsurfing material. Step by step with repeated slow motion, pleasant, technical explanation. Peter hart is very competent dissecting maneuvers in a way you will assimilate and put in practice with confidence. Even if you don't windsurf, this stuff is great to watch.
I bought this set of DVDs in a sailing store. Peter Hart shows great examples of what and what not to do. It is specially useful for beginners. It has several tips to adjust your equipment and style.
